main event: A bright green object was observed turning with a bright glow, then exploded in South Charleston, West Virginia on September 25, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to turn and glow brightly before exploding., The witness suspected the object might be a balloon based on its behavior., The weather during the observation was clear., The object was estimated to be about 10,000 feet away., The main witness was a 14-year-old male.
